messages.text:
Please wait w/ this review. This can be done much simpler using a
template for printing.
- gri

On Wed, Jan 11, 2012 at 9:04 PM,  <gri@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> go/doc: start of a testing framework for go/doc
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082/
>
> Affected files:
>  A src/pkg/go/doc/doc_test.go
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2012/01/13 01:17:29, adg wrote:
> LGTM

Although change CL description as this doesn't provide printing support anymore.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082/diff/6004/src/pkg/go/doc/print.go
File src/pkg/go/doc/print.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082/diff/6004/src/pkg/go/doc/print.go#newcode15
src/pkg/go/doc/print.go:15: // Fprint prints the package documentation to w.
Maybe put these in the test?
It is unclear that this package should be
dictating the documentation form.
Godoc will be using the text templates,
and it is similarly unclear that this package
should be reading those templates directly.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2906cd4c52c5 ***

go/doc: initial testing support

R=rsc, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082

PTAL

http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082/diff/6004/src/pkg/go/doc/print.go
File src/pkg/go/doc/print.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5533082/diff/6004/src/pkg/go/doc/print.go#newcode15
src/pkg/go/doc/print.go:15: // Fprint prints the package documentation to w.
On 2012/01/12 23:21:51, rsc wrote:
> Maybe put these in the test?
> It is unclear that this package should be
> dictating the documentation form.
> Godoc will be using the text templates,
> and it is similarly unclear that this package
> should be reading those templates directly.

Done.

subject: code review 5533082: go/doc: printing and testing support
